replies.body:
Odd, the original post 6 months ago said that if you own both skins, and get to honor 5, you'll get BOTH chromas, now its only 1?

https://imgur.com/a/SDm3VW2

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
THIS. Why is no one talking about this?
instead of a tiny carrot on a stick, riot decided they'd prefer just to beat you with the stick
Guess they want it slow and painful like everything else.
Logged in **JUST** to upvote this.

Though happy you have not forgotten about Honor rewards I kinda hoped you would bring 2 new honor skins with the lost sewn chaos Blitz and Amumu, like I don't think they need to be high spec skins, I mean its just a reward for not being a dick but I feel like simply adding chromas each year might devalue the skins and what they represent now.
Sewn Chaos Amumu was precious T-T
I would love that so much! Personally, I was excited for Sean Chaos Blitz and Amumu. It would be awesome to see them bring back skins that way.
I really dont know why they scrapped those skins. Every comment Ive seen has been wow I was excited for those! And then they said they werent coming out.

>We'll add new chromas for these skins each season to keep the rewards coming.

Why not add new skins to the honor system?

I like the new chromas; I also agree that new skins would be cool and hope they do that at some point.  For example, the skin you get for earning a certain Rank is different each year, so it'd be cool if Honor rewards introduced a new champ each year, as well.

(To be perfectly clear I'm not trying to imply they should be Limited)
what if you dont play these champions? im a supp main and i play neither of these and have no desire to. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:4}}  WW support time!  {{champion:19}} {{item:3097}} 
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I know right lol me too DX so I'll just pass
The new reward for honor is chromas for only 2 skins? Neither of whose champions I see played very often I might add. Pretty disappointing tbh.
I think it's pretty disapointing to have chromas on the same skin from last year. I was expecting another exclusive skin with chromas...

I'm just here laughing at all the people saying NA doesn't honor. Pretty much every game I'm in has everyone honor someone. 

Maybe you're just toxic and no one honors YOU?

Kind of frustrated by the fact I've had honor five every year but I didn't get either the first year so I don't get a chroma despite being honorable :( Feels like extra salt in the wound of missing out due to rng in the first place.

To be clear, you can choose to get a chroma for the skin you own OR the other skin.
I ageee it sucks that it was up to RNG; I play a lot so I got both and assumed everyone would automatically get a Capsule with them before the season ended.  Bummed when I heard that wasn't the case earlier this year.

Wish I could get one of them. Too bad because of how the honor system works I will never get Honor 5 by the end of the season despite being very consistently honored and having amassed a ton of them just because I transferred around May and my honor level reset. And it's not like ranked where I can just grind back to where I was before the transfer.

> [{quoted}](name=Technorch,realm=EUW,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=EmpsbPtE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-29T18:05:15.458+0000)
>
> Wish I could get one of them. Too bad because of how the honor system works I will never get Honor 5 by the end of the season despite being very consistently honored and having amassed a ton of them just because I transferred around May and my honor level reset. And it's not like ranked where I can just grind back to where I was before the transfer.

I feel the pain. I got hit with a chat restriction for 5 games earlier this year for absolute bs while the other person got nothing. I was already almost Honor 4 when it happened and I just barely hit Honor 3. Guess it's just what happens...
Same thing happened to me but since nobody on NA honors supports I've just barely hit honor level 2. And I actually was honor level 4, 2 checkpoints away from 5. Honestly its ridiculous.
I hit level five a while ago and I'm a support main :X so no... people do honor supports.

They're always willing to look into inappropriate punishments (or any, for that matter), so if you want, you can submit a [Support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com) or message them on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).

i stopped playing because of how toxic the game is and how little they look into thing. i never have been banned or restricted but its hard to play a game where strategy is so important when you have to mute everyone in the first 5 minutes.

Wait wait wait.... if Grey WW gets a chroma then he.... isnt.... grey.... ww any more
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
New patch dropped, was already honor 5 before 9.16 here we are 9.17 and yet to receive my chromas........
Why not *both* skins that you originally said?  https://imgur.com/a/SDm3VW2

I feel like some of these salty complainers in this thread aren't going to be hitting honor 5 anyway... ;)  

It is good to keep the rewards fresh and spicy if you want them meaningful, though, of course.
I hit honor 5 about a month before 9.16 went live. I got an honor capsule a couple days ago (about a week into 9.16) and the chromas were not in it??? (I already have both the ww and twitch skins)
Hey Riot I havent recieved my honor 5 tokens for chromas. Was I suposed to get them when patch 9.16 happened?

I have already gotten two level 5 capsules before patch 9.16 about a month ago and they contained basically nothing, keys shards and blue essence. I don't think i should of opened them but quite frankly why did i receive two capsules if they were only good at a certain release patch a month after i got the second one.

Honor 5 really isn't hard to get. Just try your best in each game. Even when things look hopeless, don't afk in fountain or grief your team. When people are toxic, /mute all. I'd recommend muting pings too because people will shower you with "?" pings if you make a mistake.  If you absolutely must say something back, do so out loud. You'll feel better, and you won't give the flamer the satisfaction of knowing they got under your skin. 

So in short, just play your best and don't type. Works every season.

Perhaps next season, you'll make Silver Kayle an achievable skin for high honours, seeing as it fits with the rest of the donor skin line. Just a thought, it be really cool for people to get the chance to try and earn that skin.

Kayle is a special purchase skin bonus.  Medieval Twitch and Grey Warwick were free for helping to promote the game.

So no it doesn't fulfil the same things.

This. Unfortunately Silver Kayle will probably never come back specifically because of how it was purchasable and the various types of laws surrounding that. That being said, theres no reason Judgement Kayle couldn't be brought back. It was made to celebrate the Tribunal, which was the old punishment/report system, and is therefore tied to the honor system. I think it'd be a really cool way to bring her back while also still keeping the skin highly exclusive, as most players will never be honor 5.

Nope. Judgement Kayle was a reward from playing 10 games during season 1. It had nothing to do with the Tribunal. So it is looked at as a reward skin, similar to the Victorious line and unfortunately has just as small of a chance on returning.

Why oh why are we not opening up the option to be rewarded with one common or uncommon skin of our choice?

This way, everyone has the potential to get a skin they want and not a skin for a champion they don't play..

If you were unlucky (only have one skin) and hit Honor 5 early (which should be a good thing) you lose out on the ability to choose between the chroma and the other skin? Feels like I'm being punished for getting honored...

"Your 2019 Honor 5 capsule will contain an Honor 5 token that can be redeemed for Medieval Twitch, Grey Warwick, or one of these new chromas (if you already own the base skin). If Twitch is your one true love, you can go right for his new chroma instead of picking up Grey Warwick!"

You can get the chroma instead of the other skin if you prefer.  It should've been stated more outright, I suppose.
No one really honors in my games except for their friends.  How am I supposed to climb honor if no one honors, especially supports D:{{sticker:sg-janna}}

I'm a support main, and I get honored all the time. To be fair, I'm really good at support for my rank.

Plus, you get honor progress every game as long as everybody honors *someone*. Don't forget to honor your team.

I did receive an Honor 5 Token, but just one. I thought we were supposed to be able to get both chromas?

Edit: Seems like you can only store 1 token at a time, relogging grants a second token. (Idk why that's the case but two tokens is two tokens I guess).

Really bummed I won't be getting the tokens. I hit honor 5 before the update but only had the twitch skin prior. I got grey ww in this year's capsule. Kind of unfair that I would even get even 1 token for a chroma when a 1st time honor 5 would get one skin and one chroma or 2 skins.

Ok so I just hit honor level 5 last night. Here I'm seeing a post saying I should have gotten two tokens for either midevil twitch or grey warwick or their chromosomes. I only received midevil twitch shard permanent. Has this changed or did mine not do it correctly? I like the twitch skin but honest dont play him much and was hoping for the warwick skin. Side note it's hilarious you guys offer a skin for a rat as a reward for honor

Edit.. auto correct changed chroma to chromosomes. I decided to leave it for comedic value
What if you already hit honor 5 and already opened the capsule?

Did you ever read the post? They said "We also know a bunch of you have already hit Honor 5—great work! If you already owned both Grey Warwick and Medieval Twitch when you received your Honor 5 Capsule this year, we’ll send you an Honor 5 token when 9.16 drops."
Sorry, I tend to scan through most articles, so I miss things from time to time. Thanks for the info!

Hey to LOL staff,
I agree that getting to Level 5 requires a lot of positive feedback by those that make it there. It deserves a VERY Special reward. Why not let Honor 5 players pick ANY skin ever made? Even special skins, not currently available, or one with a special requirement. Put H5 2019 or the Honor 5 ward WATERMARK somewhere on the skin ART... so those playing against that 'special skined' person KNOW they are an Honor 5 player and that they chose THAT SKIN as their favorite of ALL skins that year! The upshot for LOL is that you do not have to make ANY new skins... just watermark the one chosen with that year's watermark! The bonus for LOL players is that they can get ANY skin made EVER for a champion they play, love or just collect. The watermark will let all know this and preserve the integrity of the original skin requirements!
WHAT A GREAT INCENTIVE TO MAKE IT TO THE HONOR 5 LEVEL EACH YEAR! ANY SKIN MADE... ONCE A YEAR after LOTS of positive playing at League! That's a great PLUS for league, all Honor 5 players and the League community in general. Bad behavior has plagued LOL in the past and this might help lessen that to some degree... ANY degree would be a major positive for League play.

Are these chromas exclusive to this year only? Like, how Prestige skins redeemable through Prestige Points are only obtainable through the points for a year, are these chromas exlusice just for 2019 and next year when you introduce new chromas these 2019 ones become unobtainable? If so, will they be obtainable another way or at a later date?
